criteria.name: Clarity
criteria.description: How clear and understandable is the judgment?

criteria.name: Fairness
criteria.description: Does the judgment reflect fairness in its reasoning and outcome?

criteria.name: Legal Basis
criteria.description: Are the laws and precedents applied correctly and appropriately?

criteria.name: Reasoning
criteria.description: Is the reasoning logical and well-supported by evidence?
